title: Blac Chyna looks almost unrecognisable as she debuts new blonde hairstyle
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Blac Chyna has sent Instagram into meltdown after she debuted her brand new look.

The model turned reality TV star, 31, took to the app to post a picture of her blonde hair, which she'd swapped her trademark raven locks for.

In the sultry snap, Chyna, whose real name is Angela Renée White, pulled a pout for the camera and flaunted a hint of cleavage as she stared down the lens.

She sported a low cut white silk top and wore false eyelashes, pink eyeshadow and a dash of lip gloss.

Chyna let the photo do the talking, captioning it with a single starry-eyed emoji.

(Image: Instagram)

Her 16.2million Instagram followers rushed to leave her gushing compliments in the comments.

One posted: "This colour changed your face. I love it. You look great."

"You look bomb with this blonde," another commented.

(Image: Getty Images)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

A third said: "You been looking so fire lately."

"You took 'giving face' to a whole new level. Yassss," another wrote.

Many just flooded the comments with fire and heart eye emojis.

(Image: Instagram)

Blac shares baby daughter Dream, two, with her ex boyfriend Rob Kardashian .

Blac and Rob agreed to joint custody of their little girl in September 2017.

This followed them both dropping lawsuits in which they alleged the other was abusive, following a whirlwind romance and failed engagement.
description: The model turned reality TV star, 31, is usually seen sporting raven locks, but has made the move to blonde
